title: IndiGo flight cancellations impacted over 9 lakh passengers in December: DGCA data
content: According to the DGCA data, flight delays impacted 8.34 lakh passengers, and airlines spent ‚Çπ4.50 crore towards facilitation in December.

title: Madras High Court closes contempt proceedings initiated against Keezhaikaatru publishers for reported book against Justice G.R. Swaminathan
content: Chief Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava and Justice G. Arul Murugan close the case after being told that no such book was published or sold at the Chennai Book Fair 2026

title: VTU to adopt 680 govt. high schools under National Service Scheme
content: The NSS, which was previously limited to universities and colleges, has been extended to high schools for the first time in the country in 2018-19 to instill a sense of social responsibility and service among students

title: Insults fly as Rahul Gandhi, Ravneet Bittu trade ‚Äòtraitor‚Äô and ‚Äòenemy of the country‚Äô jibes
content: A heated exchange during Opposition protests in¬†the¬†Parliament¬†complex¬†spiralled¬†into a wider controversy, prompting protests¬†and¬†counter-accusations¬†from Congress and BJP

title: Cardamom harvest hit by unusual cold spell in Idukki
content: Delay in maturation of cardamom capsules resulted in fewer harvests and substantial income loss in December and January

title: Raw material shortage hits pencil slat industry
content: Manufacturers allege that plywood industry is aggressively outbidding them for softwoods from Vatta and Ilavu, the most suitable for pencil production

title: Former MLA alleges Jagan regime meted out injustice to Rayalaseema
content: Byreddy Rajasekhar Reddy challenges¬†the YSRCP leaders to a debate on the development achieved in the region during the TDP and YSRCP regimes

title: Questions on caste for the Census will be notified before the second phase: Home Ministry to Parliament
content: As reported by The Hindu, the final questionnaire for caste enumeration is likely to be known only in September, when the second phase of Census 2027 will be carried out in Ladakh and the snow-bound areas of J&K, Himachal Pradesh, and Uttarakhand, ahead of the rest of the country

title: A.P. all set to unveil Water Policy 2026-27 on February 5
content: The comprehensive policy aims at making the State drought-resilient while ensuring equitable water allocation for domestic, irrigation, industrial, aquaculture, and other uses

title: State Budget: Finance Minister K.N. Balagopal announces additional allocations
content: Announces a 5% wage hike for contract workers and daily wage earners, hikes in compensations linked to human-wildlife conflicts and a 10% increase in the lump-sum grant of Scheduled Caste, Scheduled Tribe students

title: Tamil Nadu Today: Supreme Court stays order that favoured Governor in V-C appointments
content: Welcome to the Tamil Nadu Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today.

title: Terrorist killed in J&K‚Äôs Kishtwar anti-terror operation: Army
content: The Army said around 5:45 p.m., contact was re-established with the terrorists on the run in the ongoing joint Operation Trashi-I¬†by the troops of the Army‚Äôs CIF Delta J&K Police and CRPF in the general area of Dichhar

title: Bharat Taxi cooperative cab service to be launched by Home Minister
content: Bharat Taxi‚Äôs ‚Äòsarathis‚Äô will be at the centre of ownership, operations, and value creation, thereby freeing them from exploitative aggregator-based models, the Cooperation Ministry says in a statement

title: A.P. CM, Deputy CM discuss Tirupati laddu row among host of issues
content: Naidu and Pawan Kalyan also deliberate on issues related to the State budget, with the session commencing on February 11¬†

title: Two-day Development Dialogue in Hubballi starting tomorrow

title: YSRCP complains to NHRC on ‚Äòbreakdown of law and order‚Äô in Andhra Pradesh
content: A delegation of the party meets NHRC Chairperson in Delhi, and alleges attempts to physically target opposition leaders in the State

title: Shopkeeper dies after being beaten up over payment for cigarettes
content: Four accused who were in an inebriated state when they assaulted the shopkeeper have been arrested by the Kakathi Police in Belagavi

title: Yumnam Khemchand Singh takes oath as Chief Minister of Manipur
content: Earlier in the day, President‚Äôs Rule, which was in effect in Manipur since February 2025, was revoked.

title: Pre-Budget meet reviews Home Department‚Äôs needs for financial year 2026‚Äì27
content: Finance Minister Keshav and Home Minister Anitha promise to accord priority to the department while finalising the allocations

title: Concern over exclusion of eye treatment package from Medisep 2
content: Qualified Private Medical Practitioners Association says exclusion of Intra-vitreal anti-VEGF injections, the timely administration of which is essential for preserving eyesight in those suffering from age-related macular degeneration, is devastating for the elderly

title: Trade deal with U.S. will hurt Indian farmers, govt wants to destroy agri sector: Kharge
content: Asserting that the deal will hurt the interests of Indian farmers, Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge alleged that the government wants to "destroy" Indian agriculture sector

title: Andhra Pradesh Govt updates inter-State transfer details, raises concerns among Telangana employees
content: Such transfers, if accepted, will affect promotion chances and service benefits of Telangana staff, an official said

title: Teen girl runs away from home with younger brother after scolding from parents in Bengaluru, found safe
content: According to the police, the siblings left their house after being reprimanded by their parents for not attending tuition classes

title: Congress has become ‚Äòtweet master party‚Äô: Haryana CM
content: The Union Budget is comprehensive and reform-oriented for the country‚Äôs 140 crore citizens, including the 2.80 crore people of Haryana, Nayab Singh Saini says

title: Complaints mount over alleged poor upkeep of LED streetlights installed under CSML project in Kochi
content: Mayor says absence of timely maintenance has become a major headache for Corporation, while Opposition LDF accuses ruling front of attempting to discredit the project implemented during its tenure

title: Entire Sikh community anguished over Rahul calling Bittu traitor: BJP
content: Ravneet Singh Bittu is not just an MP elected from Ludhiana, he is not just a member of a Sikh family that has served the country, his grandfather, Sardar Beant Singh, who was the Chief Minister of Punjab, fell to an assassin's bullet. And you call him a traitor. This is unacceptable, says Union Minister Hardeep Singh Puri

title: Kerala will press Centre to check flight cancellations, fare hikes affecting NRIs: CM Pinarayi Vijayan
content: He says introducing a parallel or alternative flight arrangement by the Kerala government is not feasible at present and is therefore not under consideration

title: Institute fellowship in the name of academic S.S. Rajagopalan: CPI(M)
content: In his condolence message, Mr. Shanmugam said Rajagopalan, popularly known as SSR, worked to ensure quality education for all in the mother tongue in an unequal society

title: TVK leader Sengottaiyan to file application to contest from Gobichettipalayam Assembly constituency
content: He reiterated that he would continue to stand by Mr. Vijay and said an announcement on the next phase of the party‚Äôs tour would be made within two days

title: Helicopter ride to be highlight of Budanur festival in Karnataka this year
content: The Budanur festival is an annual religious and cultural celebration in Karnataka centered around 13th century Hoysala-era Ananthapadmanabha temple and the Kashi Vishwanatha temple

title: Kerala‚Äôs proposed RRTS for high-speed rail travel | Explained
content: Kerala govt has approved a Regional Rapid Transit System to facilitate high-speed rail travel from Thiruvananthapuram to Kasaragod, addressing perceived Central govt neglect of previous proposals. Covering 583 km at an estimated cost of ‚Çπ1.92 lakh crore, the project aims to improve State connectivity and integrate with existing metro systems, with a phased completion target of 2036

title: TVK seeks permission for Vijay‚Äôs campaign meeting in Salem on February 13
content: According to the petition, Mr. Vijay is scheduled to address the gathering from his vehicle, with about 11,000 party cadre and 24,000 members of the public expected to participate

title: J&K LoP objects to referring Rajouri, Poonch as region; says it was ‚ÄòChandrabhaga‚Äô earlier
content: The BJP MLA alleged that some parties were acting to suit their political interests and reiterated that Jammu and Kashmir remains an undivided unit

title: Commerce Minister's press conference during session breaches House tradition, says Congress
content: Parliamentary Affairs Minister Kiren Rijiju acknowledged the Congress member's objection, saying he agreed with the point of order and that such a tradition does exist

title: Bengaluru Traffic Police crack down on bike stunts
content: The special enforcement drive was aimed at curbing reckless riding practices, and improving road safety

title: In new set of T.N. Assembly poll promises, AIADMK offers three cooking gas cylinders, hike in old-age pension
content: With the latest round of assurances, the total number of poll promises made by the AIADMK has gone up to 10

title: T.N. Assembly election: Seat-sharing committee will decide seats for Congress, says DMK leader Kanimozhi
content: Speaking to reporters after holding discussions with representatives of various organisations to elicit their views and suggestions for inclusion in the manifesto, Ms. Kanimozhi, who is heading the manifesto committee, said the panel would consider appropriate inputs for inclusion with the Chief Minister‚Äôs approval.

title: President‚Äôs Rule revoked in Manipur, Yumnam Khemchand Singh to take oath as CM

title: SC notice to Centre on plea challenging NBEMS's decision to reduce NEET PG cut-off percentile
content: According to the notice published by NBEMS, the NEET PG cutoff for the general category has been reduced to seven percentile from 50

title: Deepak death case: Court posts order on Shimjitha‚Äòs bail plea to February 6
content: Order was deferred in the wake of the custody application moved by police at Kunnamangalam Judicial First Class Magistrate Court

title: New U.S. tariff policy favours agricultural exports; raises concern for Indian farmers: Sharad Pawar
content: ‚ÄúA clear picture of the recent India-U.S. trade deal would emerge in the next two days,‚Äù Sharad Pawar told reporters in Baramati

content: Ernakulam District Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission observes that a passenger transport operator is under a clear duty to provide a roadworthy vehicle and render the service with reasonable care and diligence

content: The¬†LoP in Lok Sabha called Union Minister of State Ravneet Singh Bittu a ‚Äútraitor‚Äù as they engaged in an exchange of words outside the Parliament

title: Agriculture, dairy sectors completely protected in trade deal with U.S.: Piyush Goyal tells Lok Sabha
content: The tariff on India is among the lowest as compared to its competitor nations, Mr. Goyal said in the Lok Sabha

title: Tamil Nadu CM Stalin to inaugurate Ranipet‚Äôs first car manufacturing plant on February 9
content: The car manufacturing plant of Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) and Tata Motors, estimated to cost ‚Çπ9,000 crore, will be the first such facility in India to manufacture the luxury models of JLR

title: Tamil Nadu government increases monthly remuneration of rural sanitary workers to ‚Çπ6,000
content: The last revision in the monthly remuneration of rural sanitary workers was carried out on April 1, 2023, when their salary was increased from ‚Çπ3,600 to ‚Çπ5,000.

title: Priest in Mudigere booked for rape
content: According to the complainant, she approached the priest to seek his guidance on her marriage prospects

title: T.N. CM Stalin condoles death of veteran educationist S.S. Rajagopalan
content: He said Mr. Rajagopalan played an instrumental role in the transformation of the education system in the State

title: Devendra Fadnavis not party to NCP merger talks, has no right to comment: Sharad Pawar
content: CM Fadnavis said if the merger talks were really in progress, then Ajit Pawar would have shared details with him

title: Harden for Garland: Grading this NBA point guard blockbuster
content: James Harden is a Cavalier. Darius Garland is a Clipper. Kevin Pelton grades each side of the Cleveland-Los Angeles trade.

title: Harden traded to Cavs: Excited to chase 1st title
content: The Clippers are trading James Harden to the Cavaliers for Darius Garland and a second-round pick, sources told ESPN, in a trade that Harden said "both sides got what they wanted."

title: Sources: LeBron expects to finish year with Lakers
content: LeBron James is expected to finish out the season with the Lakers, league sources told ESPN on Tuesday.

title: Winfield's INT of Burrow seals NFC's Pro Bowl win
content: Buccaneers safety Antoine Winfield Jr. jumped a route to intercept Bengals quarterback Joe Burrow to seal the NFC's 66-52 comeback win against the AFC in the league's third Pro Bowl flag football game Tuesday night.

title: Curry, LeBron, KD to team up at ASG; Kawhi, too
content: Stephen Curry will be joining Olympic teammates LeBron James and Kevin Durant once again, this time at the NBA All-Star Game. And the Clippers' Kawhi Leonard was added to the pool of U.S. players Tuesday shortly before the rosters were unveiled.

title: Sources: Celtics land Vucevic in trade with Bulls
content: The Celtics added some much-needed frontcourt help, acquiring Nikola Vucevic from the Bulls for Anfernee Simons and a second-round draft pick, sources told ESPN.

title: NFLPA: Players 'have no appetite' for 18th game
content: NFL Players Association leadership made it clear Tuesday that the players aren't in support of an expanded regular-season schedule.

title: Bryce James, son of LeBron, to redshirt for Arizona
content: Bryce James, youngest son of NBA star LeBron James, is going to redshirt his freshman season at Arizona, coach Tommy Lloyd confirmed Tuesday.

content: In a sprint to the early signing period, Franklin gutted his former school and brought life to the Hokies.

content: From touchdowns to fun celebrations, here are the must-see moments from the 2026 Pro Bowl flag football game.

content: Lindsey Vonn, Nick Goepper, Gus Kenworthy and Maddy Schaffrick are in their golden years at the 2026 Olympics. Just don't call them old.

content: Laila Edwards, a standout at Wisconsin, is ready for her Olympic debut as USA Hockey's first Black player.

content: The Tigers seek to sweep a key series in the SEC, but the Longhorns look to avenge their loss in Baton Rouge from last month.

content: The fourth stop of the PGA Tour season brings us to Scottsdale, where we can expect to see plenty of birdies at the WM Phoenix Open.

content: From pregame style to fashion week, NFL fashion editor Kyle Smith helps players level up their style.

content: Projected final score and box score for the Super Bowl as well as over 100 Super Bowl props arranged in five value tiers.

content: Andre Snellings and Eric Moody provide fantasy reactions as trades go down leading up to Thursday's NBA trade deadline.

content: If you deal SGA, Giannis and Michael Porter Jr., here's who you should get in return -- and who you should avoid.

title: Stevenson claims No. 1 spot in new division
content: Shakur Stevenson is the top-ranked fighter in two divisions following a dominant win over Teofimo Lopez Jr. Here are the latest ESPN divisional rankings.

title: Way-too-early Grand Slam predictions for the rest of 2026
content: Carlos Alcaraz and Elena Rybakina are the newly crowned Australian Open champions. Who will win the rest of the majors? We make predictions.

title: Angry Sun Puts India At Risk, ISRO Warns Of Strong Radio Blackout
content: The Sun is angry again, unleashing a series of powerful solar flares that have triggered warnings from space agencies across the world, including India's ISRO, which is closely monitoring the situation for potential strong radio blackout conditions.

title: Operation KIYA: 2 Jaish Terrorists Killed In Encounter In J&K's Udhampur
content: Two Jaish-e-Mohammad terrorists, including their top commander, Maavi, have been killed in an encounter by the Indian Army.

title: Opinion: Blog | Salman Khan, Now Rohit Shetty: The Bishnoi Threat Isn't New For Bollywood
content: The recent attacks on Rohit Shetty and Salman Khan have rekindled flashes from a chapter many thought had long been buried.

title: Yumnam Khemchand Singh Sworn In As Manipur Chief Minister, Gets 2 Deputies
content: Yumnam Khemchand Singh took oath as the new Chief Minister of Manipur this evening. Along with him, Deputy Chief Ministers Nemcha Kipgen and Losii Dikho, and the state's new Home Minister Govindas Konthoujam took oath.

title: Video: 20-km Jam On Mumbai-Pune Expressway After Gas Tanker Overturns
content: It is a nightmare, 20 km long, and over 24 hours later it's not over yet. Hundreds of commuters including women and children are stranded on the Khandala Ghat section of the Mumbai-Pune Expressway after a tanker overturned and started leaking gas.

title: Video: Cluster Of Gas-Filled Balloons Explodes In Mumbai Lift, 2 Injured
content: For a group of people who entered an elevator in a building in Mumbai, it seemed like just another uneventful day. But CCTV footage showed otherwise.

title: Women MPs Surrounded PM's Seat: Inside Story Of Lok Sabha Chaos
content: The ruckus in the Lok Sabha that led to the cancellation of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's reply to the Vote of Thanks following the President's address, had started early on Wednesday.

title: Renowned Sociologist Andre Beteille Dies In Delhi At 91
content: Noted sociologist and writer Andre Beteille died due to age-related illness at a hospital here on Tuesday night. He was 91.

title: Rs 8,189 Crore Saved From Being Stolen In Cyber Frauds From 2021-25: Centre
content: The government has saved Rs 8,189 crore from getting stolen by cyber criminals in more than 23.61 lakh cases reported during the last four years, Rajya Sabha was informed Wednesday.

title: Scolded For Skipping Classes, 2 Bengaluru Kids, 13 And 9, Run Away From Home
content: A seemingly normal parental scolding over missed tuition classes took an unexpected turn in Bengaluru's Ashwath Nagar when a 13-year-old girl and her 9-year-old brother decided to run from their home.

title: 3 Sisters - 12, 14, 16 - Jump Off 9th Floor After Parents Take Away Phone
content: Three minor sisters jumped to death from the ninth floor of their apartment building in Uttar Pradesh's Ghaziabad, allegedly after their parents took away their mobile phone, stopping them from playing an online game.

title: President's Rule Revoked In Manipur, NDA Leaders Stake Claim
content: President's Rule has been removed from the border state Manipur nearly a year after it came into force. The move came hours ahead of the new Manipur government's oath ceremony scheduled this evening.

title: Turkish Airlines Aircraft Lands In Kolkata After Right Engine Catches Fire
content: The right engine of a passenger aircraft of Turkish Airlines on Wednesday afternoon caught on fire promoting emergency at Tribhuvan International Airport in Kathmandu, airport officials confirm.

title: "Justice Crying...", Mamata Banerjee, In Top Court, Tells Chief Justice On SIR
content: A defiant Mamata Banerjee tore into the Election Commission as the Chief Minister of West Bengal entered the Chief Justice of India (CJI)'s chamber this afternoon to argue her petition challenging the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of voter rolls.

title: UP Man Hires Hitmen To Kill Wife, They Fail Twice, Shoot At Her In 3rd Attempt
content: A woman survived after being shot by contract killers hired by none other than her own husband. The reason -- he thought she had an affair with their neighbour.

title: Parliament Budget Session 2026¬†Day 3 Live: Lok Sabha Adjourned, PM Modi Won't Speak Today
content: Parliament Budget Session 2026¬†Day 3 Live Updates:¬†Prime Minister Narendra Modi will address the Lok Sabha at 5 pm, as a standoff continues between the Treasury and Opposition benches.

title: On Camera, Car Driver Tries To Run Over Woman After Argument In Mumbai
content: A car tried to run over a woman in Mumbai's Oshiwara, allegedly after its driver had an argument with the car's driver.

title: "No Sexual Intent": Indian Restaurateur Admits To Spiking Woman's Drink
content: A 63-year-old Indian restaurateur, Vikas Nath, has admitted to spiking a woman's drink at London's Mayfair private members' club Annabel's. But he claims it was to "relax" her, not for sexual intent

title: Russia Demands Ukraine To Accept Its Conditions As US-Mediated Talks Open
content: Moscow on Wednesday demanded Kyiv accept its conditions to end the four-year war and vowed to press on with its invasion otherwise, as negotiations between the two sides opened in Abu Dhabi.

title: Operation 'Trashi-I': One terrorist killed in J&K's Kishtwar
content: Security forces neutralised one terrorist in Kishtwar during Operation 'Trashi-I'. This follows a series of encounters targeting Pakistan-based Jaish-e-Mohammad militants. Separately, two Pakistani terrorists, including a top JeM commander, were killed in a cave in Udhampur during Operation 'Kiya', concluding a prolonged gunfight.

title: World Cup dream over for Samson? Surya confirms 'definitely Ishan' to open
content: India's T20 World Cup warm-up saw Ishan Kishan open alongside Abhishek Sharma, potentially impacting Sanju Samson's World Cup selection. Captain Suryakumar Yadav confirmed the opening pair, emphasizing the team's strategy. This move follows recent shifts in batting order, with Kishan's strong form and Samson's inconsistent returns influencing management decisions.

title: India-US trade deal decoded: What does it mean for economy, markets & Russian oil imports?
content: India and the US have announced a framework for a bilateral trade deal to strengthen trade ties, under which the US will cut tariffs on Indian goods to 18% from 50%. The Centre has clarified that agriculture and dairy remain protected, while sectors such as textiles, leather and gems may benefit.

title: Explained: What is Anthropic's AI tool that wiped $285 billion off software stocks in a single day
content: A swift market reaction, dubbed 'SaaSpocalypse,' saw software stocks plummet by $285 billion after Anthropic's AI assistant, Claude Cowork, launched new plugins.  The legal workflow automation plugin, in particular, triggered a selloff in legal tech and broader software sectors. Analysts now fear AI platforms are becoming direct competitors to existing software providers.

title: Rahul's 'traitor' remark on Bittu snowballs into controversy - top developments
content: Rahul Gandhi's "traitor friend" jibe at BJP MP Ravneet Singh Bittu during a Parliament protest has sparked outrage. BJP leaders condemned the remark as unacceptable and offensive to the Sikh community, demanding an apology. Bittu retaliated, accusing Congress of atrocities against Sikhs and calling them "murderers."

title: Oppn, BJP MPs spar in Speaker office as Nishikant Dubey flashes 'Bofors' book in LS to target Gandhi family
content: Lok Sabha witnessed heated exchanges as opposition MPs protested BJP's Nishikant Dubey targeting the Gandhi family with book references. Following adjournment, Congress MPs met Speaker Om Birla, while Union Minister Kiren Rijiju was also present. This follows earlier disruptions over former Army chief's memoir and Rahul Gandhi's disallowed quotes.

title: Nvidia CEO on why $200 billion-plus wipe out in global stock markets is purely 'illogical'
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has called fears of AI making software companies obsolete 'illogical.' He argues AI will leverage existing tools, not replace them. This comes after AI startup Anthropic's new plugins for its Claude Cowork tool, particularly for legal work, triggered a massive selloff in global software stocks, wiping out billions.

title: 9 editions, no home winners: The strange history of the T20 World Cup
content: India secured their second T20 World Cup title in 2024, defeating South Africa in a thrilling final. This victory ended an 11-year drought and added to their inaugural win in 2007. The tournament has seen six different champions across nine editions, with a curious trend of host nations never winning the title.

title: ‚ÄòAs good as Bradman‚Äô: Tragic life of prodigy Archie Jackson who died aged 23
content: Almost a century ago, on February 4, 1929, 19-year-old Archie Jackson, hailed as Bradman's equal, achieved his sole Test century in his debut Ashes match for Australia. This stunning 164 was the highlight of a tragically short career. Jackson played only eight Tests before succumbing to tuberculosis at 23, leaving behind a legacy of immense promise.

title: Google may have an 'India plan' to tackle H-1B visa restrictions
content: Alphabet is significantly expanding its presence in Bangalore, India, with a massive new office complex potentially housing 20,000 employees. This strategic move aims to circumvent rising H-1B visa costs for Indian engineers in the US.  The tech giant is actively recruiting AI and engineering talent, mirroring a broader trend of Big Tech increasing its India workforce.

title: AI reimagines K3G cast: George Clooney, Meryl Streep and Tom Cruise go viral
content: Filmmaker Karan Johar reacted with amusement to an AI-generated video reimagining Hollywood stars in his iconic film 'Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham'. Meryl Streep as Nandini and George Clooney as Yashvardhan were highlighted, with Johar jokingly expressing his desire to have Streep in his films.

title: Ghaziabad sisters‚Äô deaths: How gaming habit during Covid times turned fatal
content: Three minor sisters died after allegedly jumping from a ninth-floor apartment balcony in Ghaziabad. Police are investigating mobile phone addiction and the influence of an online Korean game, noting the girls were distressed after their phone usage was restricted. A diary entry expressing sorrow was recovered.

title: Putin calls Russia‚ÄìChina ties a ‚Äòstabilising force‚Äô in video call with Xi
content: Russian President Putin and Chinese President Xi Jinping lauded their "strategic" economic partnership, emphasizing energy, nuclear power, and high-tech cooperation.  The leaders affirmed mutual support for sovereignty and development paths. This high-level exchange occurs as China balances engagement with Western nations while maintaining strong ties with Moscow, despite ongoing global turbulence.

title: Indian IT stocks crash: Infosys, TCS, Wipro down up to 7% - how a US startup is cause of fall
content: Shares of major IT companies, including Infosys, Wipro, HCL Tech and Persistent Systems, slid as much as 6 per cent in early trade. The negative sentiment mirrored weakness on Wall Street, where the technology-heavy benchmark Nasdaq declined 1.4 per cent, erasing nearly $300 billion in market capitalisation across the sector.

title: Delhi to Antarctica: AIIMS doctors redefine ‚Äòremote‚Äô using telerobotic system
content: Doctors in Delhi successfully conducted a live ultrasound scan on a patient in Antarctica using a remotely controlled robotic arm. This groundbreaking demonstration by AIIMS highlights the potential for delivering specialist medical care across vast distances, offering a vital solution for remote and underserved regions.

title: 'We lose a piece of who we are': The slow fade of mud wrestling in heart of Old Delhi
content: Traditional wrestling akhadas in Old Delhi are facing a decline due to reduced public interest and the fading of local competitions. The Covid-19 pandemic exacerbated financial struggles and halted tournaments, leading to closures. Concerns over fixed bouts and betting have eroded spectator trust, impacting young wrestlers' aspirations and the sport's future.

title: T20 World Cup: When and where to watch IND vs SA warm-up match
content: India and South Africa will face off in their sole T20 World Cup 2026 warm-up match on Wednesday, February 4, in Navi Mumbai. This fixture offers both teams a crucial final opportunity to fine-tune their strategies, batting orders, and bowling plans before the tournament commences on February 7.

title: Despite earning Rs 1 cr a year, IT professional says he can't afford a home in Gurgaon
content: Young professionals in Gurugram express deep frustration over exorbitant property prices, finding little value for their money despite high salaries.  A Reddit discussion highlights the disconnect between the city's aspirational image and the reality of poor construction, inadequate infrastructure, and a lack of trust in builders, leaving many questioning their decision to live and invest there.

title: India-US trade deal: Kharge questions secrecy around pact; seeks clarity in Parliament
content: Congress chief Mallikarjun Kharge questioned the India-US trade deal's announcement, citing a lack of parliamentary and public consultation. He contrasted it with the transparent Indo-US civil nuclear agreement. Kharge raised concerns about potential compromises, zero tariffs on US imports, and the impact on Indian farmers and Russia oil trade, demanding full disclosure.

title: Father, his 2 wives who are sisters, 5 children - all lived together before triple suicide
content: Three minor sisters, aged 12, 14, and 16, died after jumping from the ninth floor of their Ghaziabad residence. Police are investigating the incident, focusing on the girls' alleged addiction to a Korean online game and excessive mobile phone use. Family members had recently restricted their phone access, reportedly causing distress.

title: 'Kept hidden under bed box': 12-year-old employed as house help rescued from Guwahati house
content: A 12-year-old child labourer was rescued from a residence in Guwahati's Panjabari area on Sunday night. Found in poor condition with signs of abuse, the girl had been working as a domestic help for six years. Employers Amarin Akhtar Lashkar and Baharul Haque Lashkar were booked by Dispur police after initially denying the child's presence.

title: Consent to a relationship does not permit filming or online abuse, rules Delhi High Court
content: The complainant, who was a married woman residing in Delhi with her children, while her husband worked in Gujarat, came into contact with the accused due to family ties

title: 'Justice crying behind closed door': Mamata in SC, leads charge against SIR
content: West Bengal chief minister and TMC supremo Mamata Banerjee approached the Supreme Court to contest the Election Commission's special intensive revision exercise. She had previously met with the Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar to voice her objections, alleging humiliation during the encounter. A Supreme Court bench is set to hear the matter.

title: 'Two fell while trying to save the third': Man who saw Ghaziabad sisters jump from 9th floor at 2am
content: Three minor sisters tragically died after jumping from a ninth-floor Ghaziabad flat early Wednesday. An eyewitness reported one sister appeared to plan the jump, while the other two fell trying to stop her. Police are investigating their alleged addiction to an online gaming app and a handwritten note found at the scene.

title: Border 2' box office collection day 13: Film inches towards Rs 290 crore
content: 'Border 2' has seen a strong box office run, crossing Rs 280 crore by its second week. Despite a promising start and a Republic Day boost, the film experienced a decline post-holiday. While facing minimal competition, it's now showing signs of losing momentum ahead of new releases.

title: 'Only deletion, no inclusion': Kalyan Banerjee gives peek into Mamata's SC hearing
content: The Supreme Court heard West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee's plea challenging the Election Commission's electoral roll revision, noting two key points in her petition. The court observed that timelines might need extension due to pending cases and issued notices to the EC and CEO for further hearing.

title: Seven popular car features that people rarely use: Last one is the most loved
content: Modern car features like gesture control and auto park assist often prove impractical for Indian drivers due to inconsistent performance and challenging road conditions. While impressive in showrooms, features such as powered tailgates, rear-seat screens, voice commands, wireless charging, and panoramic sunroofs frequently go unused, with owners preferring simpler, reliable alternatives for daily commutes.

title: Saudi Arabia‚Äôs oil giant Saudi Aramco raises $4 billion: Shakes global markets, has Wall Street buzzing
content: Saudi Arabia‚Äôs oil giant Saudi Aramco has successfully raised $4 billion through a bond issuance. The move highlights strong investor trust in the company's financial stability. The issuance, part of a global program, was priced in January 2026 and completed in early February 2026. Proceeds will fund capital expenditures and diversification efforts. This strengthens Aramco's financial position and boosts confidence in Saudi Arabia's economy.

title: 'Traitor' vs 'sadak ka gunda': Rahul, BJP's Bittu face off outside Parliament ‚Äî Watch
content: A heated exchange occurred between Rahul Gandhi and Union Minister Ravneet Singh Bittu on Parliament steps, escalating into a political war of words. This confrontation happened amidst Opposition protests and the Lok Sabha's adjournment due to the suspension of eight MPs for disrupting proceedings.

title: Switch from Russia to Venezuela crude oil possible? SBI sees $3 bn savings - explained
content: India could slash its crude import bill by nearly $3 billion annually by strategically shifting from Russian oil to Venezuelan heavy crude. A discount of $10-12 per barrel on Venezuelan oil makes this switch commercially viable, despite longer shipping routes. This potential saving highlights evolving import strategies driven by market dynamics and refining capabilities.

title: Anganwadi cook saves 20 children from bee attack, gets stung repeatedly, dies
content: In a harrowing display of courage at a Neemuch anganwadi, Kanchan Bai Meghwal emerged as a true hero when she bravely shielded a group of children from an aggressive swarm of bees. Utilizing tarpaulins and mats, she managed to create a barrier, drawing the attention of the furious insects towards herself.

title: Dog on road, delay in care: Rider ‚Äòbooked‚Äô for own death in Gujarat
content: A man died after an accident caused by a stray dog, followed by alleged inadequate treatment at two hospitals. His family claims systemic apathy, as he has been booked for his own death due to negligent driving. The police are investigating the sequence of events and hospital treatment records.

title: 'I'm a very awkward guy': MS Dhoni reveals why he avoids commentary box and phone calls
content: Mahendra Singh Dhoni has largely ruled out a career in cricket commentary, citing the difficulty in balancing description with criticism and his struggle with memorizing statistics.  He prefers listening and absorbing information rather than speaking, though he humorously admits to still being awkward at phone conversations.

title: IIT-Bombay student jumps to death from hostel terrace
content: A 21-year-old IIT Bombay student, Naman Agarwal, a second-year BTech Civil Engineering student from Rajasthan, died by suicide after allegedly jumping from a hostel terrace. Campus authorities alerted police, who are investigating the circumstances. No suicide note has been found, and statements are being collected.

title: Mumbai‚ÄìPune eway in chaos: Mishap sparks 12-hour jam, traffic still paralysed
content: A dramatic incident unfolded on the Mumbai-Pune Expressway when a gas tanker flipped, bringing traffic to a standstill overnight. Cars were rerouted to the older highway as emergency crews scrambled to manage a dangerous leak of propylene gas near the Adoshi tunnel. For over 12 hours, countless drivers found themselves stranded, lacking essential services.

title: 'Is age a factor?': Dhoni backs Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli to chase 2027 World Cup dream
content: Former captain MS Dhoni supports Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli for the 2027 Cricket World Cup. He believes performance and fitness, not age, should decide their future in ODI cricket. Dhoni emphasises that experienced players offer invaluable guidance to younger teammates. He stated that if they continue to perform and remain fit, they should be considered for selection.

title: Operation Kiya: Two terrorists killed by security forces in J&K's Udhampur
content: Two Jaish-e-Muhammad terrorists were neutralized in a joint operation by the Indian Army, Jammu and Kashmir Police, and CRPF in Udhampur's Basantgarh area. The intense encounter began Tuesday afternoon following specific intelligence inputs about militant movement. Security forces established contact and a firefight ensued, leading to the successful operation.

title: ‚ÄòSafeguarded agriculture, dairy': Piyush Goyal hails India-US trade deal in Parliament
content: Union minister Piyush Goyal defended the India-US trade agreement in Lok Sabha, stating India successfully safeguarded its agriculture and dairy sectors after nearly a year of negotiations. The deal, finalized after intensive discussions, aims to promote Indian initiatives and enhance export competitiveness. US President Trump announced a tariff reduction to 18% for Indian products, a move welcomed by PM Modi.

title: 'Sorry papa': Heartwrenching suicide note by Ghaziabad sisters before jumping from 9th floor
content: Three young sisters, aged 16, 14, and 12, tragically ended their lives by jumping from their ninth-floor Ghaziabad apartment. Investigators believe their alleged addiction to an online gaming app, coupled with parental restrictions and prolonged school absence since the pandemic, may have contributed to the devastating act.

title: MMA divisional rankings: Benoit Saint Denis, Mauricio Ruffy rise at lightweight
content: Saturday's UFC 325 was headlined by a meeting between the No. 1-ranked featherweight, champion  Alexander Volkanovski , and No. 2  Diego Lopes , a fight won by the champ. But it was one weight class heavier where the fight card impacted the ESPN divisional MMA rankings. Lightweight  Beno√Æt Saint Denis  knocked out  Dan Hooker  in the co-main event to move up three spots to No. 7. And in the fight right before that,  Mauricio Ruffy  scored a knockout of  Rafael Fiziev  to earn a place in the top 10. Those were the only changes in the rankings. Here are the  ESPN pound-for-pound MMA rankings  and a  list of current UFC champions  in all weight classes. Results are current; rankings as of Feb. 3. To be eligible for the rankings, a fighter must have competed over the past 12 months or must have an upcoming fight booked. Fighters who have been dropped for inactivity can be reinstated only after they compete.

title: NBA All-Star Game uniforms and court unveiled, inspired by L.A. and new format
content: the 75th all-Star Game uniforms will be tailored to the newly formed U.S. vs. world format . a Los Angeles-style font spells out "All-Stars" across the chest of all three uniforms . the 2026 All-Star game pits two teams against one world squad .
